definition: at or constituting a border or edge
details:
adjective
- at or constituting a border or edge
= example: at or constituting a border or edge
= synonyms: fringy
- of questionable or minimal quality
= synonyms: borderline
- producing at a rate that barely covers production costs
= example: producing at a rate that barely covers production costs
- just barely adequate or within a lower limit
= synonyms: bare
